meta.title: Create Dummy Test Command and Skill

overview: Create a minimal /dummy-test slash command and its corresponding skill to demonstrate the plugin command/skill pattern. The command will be defined in plugin/commands/dummy-test.md and will activate a skill in plugin/instructions/dummy-test/INSTRUCTIONS.md. When invoked, the skill outputs a simple test message confirming it works. This serves as a reference implementation for creating new commands and skills in the plugin system. The implementation must follow existing patterns from other commands like /init and /task-list.

objectives.description: Create the dummy-test command file at plugin/commands/dummy-test.md
steps: Create the command file with YAML frontmatter containing description
Add command documentation explaining what it does
Reference the dummy-test skill for execution
notes: Follow the pattern from existing commands like init.md and task-list.md
Use descriptive frontmatter that will appear in command listings

objectives.description: Create the dummy-test skill directory and INSTRUCTIONS.md
steps: Create INSTRUCTIONS.md with simple execution instructions
Instructions should output a test confirmation message
notes: Keep it minimal - this is a demonstration skill
The output message should confirm the skill executed successfully

objectives.description: Verify the command and skill integrate correctly
steps: Document how to test the command manually
Ensure command appears in available commands
Confirm skill can be activated via command
notes: Manual testing is sufficient for this simple feature
Check that no errors occur during skill activation
